page.title: 19HOLLINGWORTH COUNTRY CENTRE2
page.content:
Although popular at all times of the year, the Warden is able to assist teachers in schools. Talks, slide shows, demonstrations are given in primary and secondary schools linked with various aspects of environmental work. A few small farm animals can be brought to a school for a talk about their use and care and to give the children an opportunity to handle them. Topics can include: 1 seasons - talk with slides, etc. 2 simple spinning 3 butter making 4 country code 5 birds - illustrated talk + specimens 6 mammals - illustrated talk
Environmental trails are prepared for individual schools using their own locality.
